EmailTemplate.name: Cross SBU.Aero Emergency Locator Transmitter Message
EmailTemplate.subject: New way to submit your ELT Coding Data
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://aerospace.honeywell.com/services> <https://twitter.com/Honeywell_Aero> <http://www.youtube.com/honeywell> <https://plus.google.com/109803702550636260475> <http://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace>
Introducing a new way to submit your Emergency Locator Transmitter (ELT) coding data online. Faster, easier, and more functional than emailing your data, this electronic form simplifies questions and answers with: radio button selections, dropdown menus, and immediate completion confirmation.
We’ve even made finding the form super easy. Just log into the MyAerospace portal <https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/>and select the Software & Database tab. We’ll also included a direct link to the new ELT form in the confirmation email of your next order.
Accessing the new form does require a MyAerospace portal ID. Don’t have an ID? No problem! Just go to the portal <http://myaerospace.com/> and sign up as a new user and then request access to the ASDS <http://www.asds.honeywell.com/> web page. We’ve decommissioned the old email method, found at aerospace.honeywell.com <http://aerospace.honeywell.com/>. So starting next week, you’ll need to begin using this new form. Need more information <https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/ELT User Guide.pdf>or help in updating your ELT? Call us at +1-602-436-6737, option 5, or click on DSA@Honeywell.com <mailto:DSA@Honeywell.com>.
